page.title: 06Fairlands Valley (cont.)
page.content: Fairlands Valley is a place where everybody can go.There is a lake for fishing and sailing. There is a park with swings and a slide and a round-about.There are paddling pools there. There is a ship there. Little children play on that.There is a band-stand there. It is a sort of triangle shape. There is a cafe over there. There is a Pub there.There are paddle boats there and canal boats. There is a Trim-track there and it goes on for a couple of miles. There is a fence which runs all the way round there. It has lots of things to do.
